Report.Mrsimulator web-app issues: Having trouble with the web-app user-interface, please open an [issue @mrsimulator-app](https://github.com/DeepanshS/mrsimulator-app/issues) and tell us about the problem.
Report.Mrsimulator library issues: Finding inconsistency with the NMR spectrum simulation, please open an [issue @mrsimulator](https://github.com/DeepanshS/mrsimulator/issues) and tell us about the inconsistency.
